UniprotID	P35557
Accession	P35557;A4D2J2;A4D2J3;Q05810
EntryName	HXK4_HUMAN
ProteinName	Hexokinase-4 (HK4) (EC 2.7.1.1) (Glucokinase) (Hexokinase type IV) (HK IV) (Hexokinase-D)
GeneName	GCK
Length	465
Function	Catalyzes the phosphorylation of hexose, such as D-glucose, D-fructose and D-mannose, to hexose 6-phosphate (D-glucose 6-phosphate, D-fructose 6-phosphate and D-mannose 6-phosphate, respectively) (PubMed:11916951, PubMed:15277402, PubMed:17082186, PubMed:18322640, PubMed:19146401, PubMed:25015100, PubMed:7742312, PubMed:8325892). Compared to other hexokinases, has a weak affinity for D-glucose, and is effective only when glucose is abundant (By similarity). Mainly expressed in pancreatic beta cells and the liver and constitutes a rate-limiting step in glucose metabolism in these tissues (PubMed:11916951, PubMed:15277402, PubMed:18322640, PubMed:25015100, PubMed:8325892). Since insulin secretion parallels glucose metabolism and the low glucose affinity of GCK ensures that it can change its enzymatic activity within the physiological range of glucose concentrations, GCK acts as a glucose sensor in the pancreatic beta cell (By similarity). In pancreas, plays an important role in modulating insulin secretion (By similarity). In liver, helps to facilitate the uptake and conversion of glucose by acting as an insulin-sensitive determinant of hepatic glucose usage (By similarity). Required to provide D-glucose 6-phosphate for the synthesis of glycogen (PubMed:8878425). Mediates the initial step of glycolysis by catalyzing phosphorylation of D-glucose to D-glucose 6-phosphate (PubMed:7742312).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Nucleus; Mitochondrion
Disorder	0.4652,0.4801,0.4901,0.5382,0.5493,0.4801,0.5176,0.5493,0.4766,0.4256,0.4220,0.4619,0.4292,0.4330,0.3566,0.3704,0.4051,0.4292,0.4685,0.3840,0.3983,0.4051,0.3529,0.3286,0.3053,0.3053,0.3286,0.3249,0.3087,0.3948,0.4220,0.4507,0.4330,0.5382,0.4541,0.5211,0.4369,0.4369,0.4220,0.4186,0.5055,0.5342,0.5176,0.5901,0.5533,0.5533,0.5254,0.4831,0.5098,0.5211,0.4119,0.3840,0.3740,0.3774,0.3807,0.4831,0.5017,0.5901,0.5707,0.5854,0.5055,0.4901,0.4801,0.4017,0.3249,0.3872,0.3215,0.3599,0.3566,0.3249,0.3215,0.4186,0.4901,0.3872,0.3840,0.3182,0.2541,0.1731,0.1229,0.1184,0.0765,0.1115,0.1184,0.1137,0.2064,0.2918,0.2918,0.3774,0.2715,0.3426,0.2783,0.2715,0.2715,0.2541,0.3599,0.3740,0.4051,0.3460,0.4186,0.3983,0.4409,0.5176,0.5254,0.4801,0.4409,0.4292,0.4186,0.4186,0.3807,0.4979,0.4582,0.4476,0.3460,0.3494,0.2609,0.1852,0.1759,0.2193,0.2399,0.1643,0.2364,0.2094,0.1162,0.0704,0.0870,0.1048,0.0985,0.1048,0.0799,0.0888,0.0780,0.0929,0.1349,0.1554,0.1731,0.1852,0.2575,0.1611,0.1501,0.1251,0.1881,0.1070,0.1229,0.1554,0.2193,0.2064,0.2328,0.2470,0.1643,0.2094,0.2094,0.2094,0.1528,0.1070,0.1092,0.0948,0.0888,0.0929,0.1554,0.1501,0.1476,0.1399,0.2002,0.1731,0.2258,0.1969,0.2224,0.2002,0.1969,0.2817,0.2129,0.1671,0.1671,0.1643,0.1611,0.2258,0.2292,0.2884,0.2094,0.2094,0.2034,0.3053,0.3149,0.3566,0.2541,0.2783,0.2645,0.2541,0.2002,0.1424,0.1184,0.1298,0.1298,0.1349,0.2094,0.2884,0.2292,0.1881,0.2193,0.2503,0.1823,0.1881,0.1229,0.0719,0.0364,0.0799,0.0749,0.0929,0.0929,0.0765,0.1229,0.0985,0.1251,0.1399,0.0817,0.0506,0.0483,0.0749,0.0909,0.0518,0.0719,0.1007,0.0592,0.0605,0.0851,0.1554,0.1554,0.1184,0.1275,0.1275,0.1476,0.1476,0.1373,0.0967,0.1349,0.2034,0.2783,0.2988,0.2884,0.2817,0.3286,0.2364,0.2034,0.2951,0.3872,0.4476,0.3321,0.3117,0.3215,0.2129,0.2002,0.2752,0.2575,0.3321,0.4149,0.3182,0.3286,0.3392,0.2193,0.1554,0.1070,0.1476,0.1501,0.2164,0.2002,0.1323,0.0835,0.1528,0.1702,0.1969,0.2988,0.2715,0.2680,0.3019,0.3019,0.2884,0.3704,0.2849,0.1881,0.3053,0.3704,0.3704,0.2752,0.3494,0.3
